summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Fiftieth Street, from Fremont Avenue to Stone Way et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 17176, creating Local Improvement District No. 1613 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
